Package org.neo4j.bolt.runtime.scheduling

Class BoltConnectionReadLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.bolt.runtime.scheduling.BoltConnectionReadLimiter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoltConnectionQueueMonitor
    public class BoltConnectionReadLimiter
extends Object
implements BoltConnectionQueueMonitor
    Queue monitor that changes Channel auto-read setting based on the job queue size. Methods enqueued(BoltConnection, Job) and drained(BoltConnection, Collection) are synchronized to make sure queue size and channel auto-read are modified together as an atomic operation.
